description: Current upstart scripts missing "--log-file" parameter for all nova services.
title: nova upstart services scripts does not provide logging

comments.content: Current upstart scripts missing --log-file parameter for all nova services.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~pavel-kirpichyov

comments.content: Nova does not ship any upstart script by the project.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zulcss

comments.content: --log-file parameter is not needed by the upstart job because its included in the nova.conf configuration file by default.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zulcss
